Plot:
When a meteorite from outer space hits a young girl and turns her into a giant monster,
she is taken to a secret government compound where she meets a ragtag group of
monsters also rounded up over the years.
-------
Notes
-------
Firstly a well done to PrisM for the first attempt and improvement, great work
and very quickly re-encoded and uploaded. Most will be happy with the PrisM
release im fussy and always like to try to go one better hehe ;)
AGAIN this is a mVs Source re-encode, HOWEVER a lot of work has been done to
improve things, its easily (Atleast IMO and hopefully the quick screens and samples show it) the best version available thus far.
-------------
Work Done
-------------
SOUND: mVs sound was pretty good for a TS, I played with it for a very short while but not much could be done to improve things, so that was left alone.

VIDEO: mVs video was another story entirely, firstly the black levels needed adjusting, white level were also adjusted. After that it was time to sort out the messy colour levels. It all had a washed out look to it along with a horrid yellow(ish) tinge, especially to the whites. Basically dull and faded like an old tape taking out of someones attic after 200 years.
Blue was VASTLY under saturated so that was fixed, Red and Green Levels were then tweaked to balance them and get rid of that yellow tinge to make white look bright and crisp again and put some colour back into things. A quick touch of contrast adjustment and brightness very slightly increased and things were starting to look good. Picture was still kind of blurry like most cams and TS releases, so a slight edge sharpening mask was applied, id have liked to of made it sharper but any higher and artifacts started to become noticable.
PrisMs release was a good improvement, but without sounding big headed i think this takes things a step further and probably makes the video overall look the best it can be from the Cam/TS source floating around.
I hope everyone enjoys it :)
-------------------
Quick sound off
-------------------
Big Hellos and respect to other re-encoders, including PrisM, JamBo, Stuffies, Lynks, Kingben, FLAWL3SS and all those i missed that show you can polish turd into gold Keep up your great work.

Any other re-encoders that also have ideas to make this even better, please go ahead, its fun to admire various encodes and any improvement tweaks people can make.

DO NOT DOWNLOAD IF YOU DONT LIKE RE-ENCODES, DO NOT COMMENT IF YOU HAVE NOTHING CONSTRUCTIVE TO SAY,
(WHO AM I KIDDING THERE WILL ALWAYS BE ONE IDIOT WITH A BIG GOB BUT EMPTY HEAD HEHE )

YOU LIKE THE RELEASE, GREAT, GLAD I COULD HELP AND GLAD YOU LIKE IT.
YOU DONT LIKE IT, THEN RUN ALONG AND FIX THINGS YOURSELF (NOT THAT WHINGERS EVER DO).
